headline: 2002 - Suspected acute haemorrhagic fever syndrome in The Republic of the Congo - Update 2
main_text: WHO has received reports of 8 suspected cases including 5 deaths of acute haemorrhagic fever syndrome in Mbomo district, Cuvette Ouest region (see previous report) . Two new suspected cases have been reported in Mbomo since the last death on 6 June. Health authorities have identified more than 40 contacts of the suspected cases.The investigation has been hampered by the lack of community cooperation.
